languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает при виде черепа — а затем резко оборачивается к собрату.{/n} "Откуда в руках мон-кай останки нашего собрата, Муаран? Ты утверждал, что мы не понесли ни единой потери в противостоянии. Мон-кай не должны были даже ведать о ком-то, подобном мне!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает при виде останков — а затем резко оборачивается к собрату.{/n} "Откуда в руках мон-кай останки нашего собрата, Муаран? Ты утверждал, что мы не понесли ни единой потери в противостоянии. Мон-кай не должны были даже ведать о ком-то, подобном мне!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the skull — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает при виде черепа — а затем резко оборачивается к собрату.{/n} "Откуда в руках мон-кай останки нашего собрата, Муаран? Ты утверждал, что мы не понесли ни единой потери в противостоянии. Мон-кай не должны были даже ведать о ком-то, подобном мне!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the remains — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

{n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the remains — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

{n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the remains — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

{n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the skull — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

languages.text: {n}看到这具头骨时，伊莉耶特愣在了那里，随后转过身盯着穆兰。{/n}“我们族人的遗体，怎么会落在猴子的手里？你声称，我们在这场抗争中没有遭受任何损失。猴子应该完全不知道我们族人的存在，也不知道我的存在才对！”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the skull — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}看到这具头骨时，伊莉耶特愣在了那里，随后转过身盯着穆兰。{/n}“我们族人的遗体，怎么会落在猴子的手里？你声称，我们在这场抗争中没有遭受任何损失。猴子应该完全不知道我们族人的存在，也不知道我的存在才对！”

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは頭蓋骨を見つめてから、ムアランの顔をキッと見る。{/n}「同胞の亡骸がモン＝ケイの手に落ちたのはなぜだ？今回の戦争で我らが損害を被ることは決してないと主張していたはずだ。モン＝ケイにアエルダリのことを、我のことを一切知らせるべきではなかった！」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the skull — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは頭蓋骨を見つめてから、ムアランの顔をキッと見る。{/n}「同胞の亡骸がモン＝ケイの手に落ちたのはなぜだ？今回の戦争で我らが損害を被ることは決してないと主張していたはずだ。モン＝ケイにアエルダリのことを、我のことを一切知らせるべきではなかった！」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet verstummt, als sie den Schädel sieht – und fährt dann zu Muaran herum.{/n} "Wie sind die Überreste eines der Unseren in die Hände der Chem-Pan-Sey geraten? Ihr habt behauptet, wir hätten bei dieser Konfrontation keinerlei Verluste erlitten. Die Chem-Pan-Sey hätten die Unseren und mich überhaupt nicht bemerken sollen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the skull — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet verstummt, als sie den Schädel sieht – und fährt dann zu Muaran herum.{/n} "Wie sind die Überreste eines der Unseren in die Hände der Chem-Pan-Sey geraten? Ihr habt behauptet, wir hätten bei dieser Konfrontation keinerlei Verluste erlitten. Die Chem-Pan-Sey hätten die Unseren und mich überhaupt nicht bemerken sollen!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se raidit en voyant le crâne, puis elle se tourne vivement vers Muaran.{/n} « Comment les mon-keigh ont-ils pu mettre la main sur la dépouille de l'un des nôtres ? À vos dires, nous n'avons subi aucune perte lors de cet affrontement. Les mon-keigh n'étaient certes pas censés nous découvrir ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the skull — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se raidit en voyant le crâne, puis elle se tourne vivement vers Muaran.{/n} « Comment les mon-keigh ont-ils pu mettre la main sur la dépouille de l'un des nôtres ? À vos dires, nous n'avons subi aucune perte lors de cet affrontement. Les mon-keigh n'étaient certes pas censés nous découvrir ! »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet enmudece al ver la calavera... y después se gira para mirar a Muaran.{/n} «¿Cómo han llegado los restos de nuestra gente a las manos de los mon-keigh? Dijiste que no habíamos sufrido ninguna baja en este enfrentamiento. ¡Se suponía que los mon-keigh no sabían nada de los nuestros ni de mí!».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the skull — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet enmudece al ver la calavera... y después se gira para mirar a Muaran.{/n} «¿Cómo han llegado los restos de nuestra gente a las manos de los mon-keigh? Dijiste que no habíamos sufrido ninguna baja en este enfrentamiento. ¡Se suponía que los mon-keigh no sabían nada de los nuestros ni de mí!».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, kafatasını görünce sessizliğe bürünüyor, ardından da hızla Muaran'a dönüyor.{/n} "Soydaşımızın naaşı nasıl oldu da mon-keighlerin eline düştü? Bu çatışmada hiç kayıp vermedik şeklinde bir iddian vardı. Mon-keighlerin türümüzden ve benden asla haberi olmamalıydı!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still when she sees the skull — and then whips around to face Muaran.{/n} "How did our kin's remains end up in the hands of the mon-keigh? You claimed we had suffered no losses at all in this confrontation. The mon-keigh should have been completely ignorant of our kind, of me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, kafatasını görünce sessizliğe bürünüyor, ardından da hızla Muaran'a dönüyor.{/n} "Soydaşımızın naaşı nasıl oldu da mon-keighlerin eline düştü? Bu çatışmada hiç kayıp vermedik şeklinde bir iddian vardı. Mon-keighlerin türümüzden ve benden asla haberi olmamalıydı!"
